name: Vertical Dash
storyline:
Ever wanted a game where you just have addictive fun? Well, here it is, it doesn't matter what you are doing, this game perfectly fits the time passer's description, waiting for a friend? Playing this game will make sure that time will be used for your daily android fun! 
 
 
Simple - Tap to jump, tap to dash to shown side, simple as that, yet effective!
